trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Fornece funcionalidade básica para controles que exibem um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"> </xref> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripDropDownItem is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripDropDownItem é a classe base abstrata para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, que pode hospedar itens diretamente ou itens de host adicionais em um contêiner de lista suspensa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>e definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access these drop-down items directly through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Acessar esses itens de lista suspensa diretamente por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe com o texto de exibição especificado, a imagem e a ação a ser tomada quando o controle de lista suspensa é clicado.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A ação a ser tomada quando o controle de lista suspensa é clicado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe com o texto de exibição especificado, imagem, e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> coleção que contém o controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> coleção que contém o controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, action to take when the drop-down control is clicked, and control name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe com o texto de exibição especificado, a imagem, a ação a ser tomada quando o controle de lista suspensa é clicado e o nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A ação a ser tomada quando o controle de lista suspensa é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Cria um genérico <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> para os eventos que podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultDropDown method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateDefaultDropDown é chamado automaticamente se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>propriedade localiza nenhuma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O criado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that will be displayed when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> que será exibido quando este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> creates a generic drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A>cria um controle suspenso genérico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the DropDown property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um controle de lista suspensa é gerado automaticamente, que significa que os itens são adicionados à coleção, e você definir a propriedade de lista suspensa para um controle de lista suspensa explícito, você poderá perder dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> fecha.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> emerges from its parent container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a direção na qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> surge do seu contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é definida como um valor que não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de itens de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the DropDownItems property to get all the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that is referred to by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DropDownItems para obter todos os itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>que é referenciado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> of controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> de controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets the screen coordinates, in pixels, of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as coordenadas de tela, em pixels, do canto superior esquerdo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> representing the x and y screen coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> que representa a x e y coordenadas em pixels da tela.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> has opened.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> foi aberto.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks the drop down item or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o usuário clica suspensa item ou quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to dynamically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para preencher dinamicamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> está abrindo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> foi criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has been created otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> foi criado caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls associated with it.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes a visible <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> hidden.
trans-unit.target: Faz uma visível <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> oculto.

trans-unit.source: Use the HideDropDown method to prevent the user from choosing one of the options available on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o método HideDropDown para impedir que o usuário escolhendo uma das opções disponíveis em associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDropDownClosed também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raised in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gerado em resposta ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: O método OnDropDownHide também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownItemClicked method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDropDownItemClicked também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> está no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> está no pressionado estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de comando são chaves que sempre têm precedência sobre as chaves de entrada regulares.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Aceleradores e atalhos do menu são exemplos de teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: O método deve retornar `true` para indicar que ele processou a chave de comando, ou `false` para indicar que a chave não é uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> if there are items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>implementação deste método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>se houver itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, essa implementação chama a implementação da classe base.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para tratar de cima para baixo, para a esquerda, direita, ENTER e barra de espaços de chaves para navegar na hierarquia de menus suspensos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo item; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> controle associado a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowDropDown method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o método ShowDropDown para exibir os controles de lista suspensa que foram definidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is the same as the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> é o mesmo que o pai <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.
